GOD.content: is Levinas’ face god or human? unable to differentiate infinite alterity of God from that of human > Levinas & Kierkegaard can’t find limit btwn religious & ethical

R.content: Levinas placed responsibility before and above “difficult freedom”

MONL.content: alone in a genre [particular] that becomes a universal example, exemplarity of host as hostage: “universal hostage”
other is entirely other when knowledge and recognition does not suffice for it

FL.content: Levinas speaks of infinite right, “Jewish humanism,” disproportion of justice, holiness (sainteté), but Derrida moves away in the context of FL

H.content: p. anne 98 Levinas: “essence of language is friendship and hospitality”
subject as a host and a hostage

VM.content: Levinas makes us tremble, from the heart of the desert, a thought which makes us dream of dispossession and dismantling: depart from Greek site, perhaps every site
Levinas’ metaphysics and ethics support themselves, do not flow into other streams at their source (nonviolent, infinitely Other)
Levinas shelters, in spite of his best efforts, most decisive moments of his discourse in metaphor [his writing style merits a study itself]
Levinas’ “false infinity” an infinity which cannot overflow the same, Plato and Descartes only 2 thinkers w/ infinity [in line] w/ Levinas’
imperialism of theoria bothers Levinas: especially phenomenology’s infusion w/ light, way it predetermined Being as object
Levinas’ method risks accusing theoretism, that which separates, of not separating

Levinas seeks a second parricide, to murder the Greek father (who still holds us in his sway), a father Plato could only hallucinate murdering, “a hallucination within the hallucination that is already speech” > could a non-Greek succeed in doing what a Greek could never do? and do so by feigning to speak Greek, can one feign to speak a language?
for Levinas, Platonic gesture beyond being ineffectual unless multiplicity and alterity understood as absolute solitude of existent in his existence

[Derrida on Levinas’ method] uses philosophy’s own light to reveal that philosophy’s surface is severely cracked (lézardes), that its solidity is its rigidity > progresses along cracks, negates negations, neither/nor, poetic force of metaphor a trace of this wounding of language
for Levinas, classical dissymmetry of same and other feigns overturning while remaining the same, impassive beneath an algebraic substitution

for Levinas, concrete (nonformal) tautology or false (finite) heterology [compare to “false infinite”], along w/ the negative (work, history, etc.), never has a relation w/ other > no negativity in metaphysical transcendence
w/out the irruption of tout-autre, internal consciousness could not se donner le temps nor [give itself] the absolute alterity of every instant
Derrida stresses that one will not be able to follow Levinas [in Totality and Infinity] if one is not convinced by equation ego = same, or by idea that rebellion against same is purely intelligible
for Levinas, classical dissymmetry of same and other feigns overturning while remaining the same, impassive beneath an algebraic substitution
Kant and Levinas both have immediate respect for other, but Levinas does not pass through neutral element of universal, nor through respect for law
for Levinas, neutral thought of Being neutralizes Other as a being
Levinas: ontology as first philosophy is philosophy of power [anti-Nietzschean?]
Levinas drags all classical concepts into agora, they’re summoned to justify themselves in ethico-political language they didn’t always seek, must confess their violent aims
caught btwn Husserl & Heidegger, Levinas always [?] criticizes the one in language of the other
for Levinas, ethics, morality, is first philosophy; though Plato and Descartes thought the overflowing of infinity, only Levinas thought infinity as the face
for Levinas, writing must be secondary to living, original speech, w/out it there could be grammar/lexicon w/out language > cybernetics, electronics
speech of God distinguishes Levinas from Socrates in Phaedrus
Levinas’ infinitism is pre-Kantian, Levinas’ reading of Descartes’ 3rd Meditation supports entirety of his thought: absolute irreducibility of other, infinitely Other can only be infinity
acc. Levinas, Husserl misunderstands Descartes’ 3rd Meditation, places infinite entirely w/in subjectivity, makes it an object, so phenomenology cannot account for ethics

for Levinas, asymmetry, non-light, commandment are violence and injustice only in relation to finite things, Levinas’ infinite God avoids a world of pure/worst violence, of immorality itself, by being infinite, does not rage war of single, naked finite man
for Levinas, totality is always finite totality
Levinas breaks w/ Parmenides, Spinoza and Hegel w/ presence as separation, “the idea of creation ex nihilo”
for Levinas, homogenization of Same and Ego, homogenized w/ concept, and finite totality, permits him to condemn state, totality, not in the name of but against subjectivity
acc. Levinas, Hegel and Kierkegaard: violent & pre-metaphysical egoisms
Levinas must pose question of closure, “question of the relations between belonging and the opening,” to break w/ phenomenology and ontology
Levinas must pose a kind of unheard of graphics, w/in which philosophical conceptuality would be no more than a function
Levinas has affinities w/ Feuerbach in latter’s anti-Hegelianism and in relation to the trace
Levinas concerned w/ essence of ethical, not laws or moral rules; wouldn’t ethics beyond law be the Law of Laws—infinite concept, hidden in protest against concept [see FWT p. 132]?
why must Levinas obliterate notion of spatiality re: the other, w/out erasing it, w/out making it illegible? > must he state infinity’s excess in language of the Same [inside-outside]?
[does Levinas try to preserve positive infinity alongside spatiality of face? should he name finite what he names infinitely other if it must pass through space, negation?]
Levinas gave up his best weapon: disdain of discourse (negative theology), does not give himself the right to speak in language resigned to its own failure
negative theology knew itself failed and finite, inferior to logos, to God’s understanding, never sought God face to face
how Levinas differs from negative theology > possibility of metaphysics is possibility of speech, metaphysical responsibility is responsibility for language, “thought consists in speaking”

if speech, which must maintain absolute separation, is rooted in space (in Same) (which cannot conceive separation and absolute alterity) > discourse is originally violent and a logos of peace becomes an inaccessible horizon
metaphysics unable to escape its ancestry in light, always supposes phenomenology in its critique of phenomenology [re: Levinas]

for Levinas, if Husserlian Cogito opened to infinite, it would be an object-infinity w/out alterity, a “false infinity” [Levinas never uses this Hegelian term, but idea of indefinite, negative form of infinity haunts his gestures]; Levinas makes true alterity nonnegativity, and the same (complicit w/ negativity) the false-infinity > would have seemed absolutely mad to Hegel
wasn’t it Husserl who showed us that vision, perception were inadequate, the infinite overflowing of horizons? did he really reduce this inadequation to condition of available objects?
Levinas deprives himself of the foundations of his own language
Levinas’ ethics not  (yet) practical?
is it risky of Levinas to think of Being as dominated by theme of unveiling when Heidegger continually affirms concealment?

Levinas seeks to oppose God to sacred divine, for God to be indicated in Space of Sacred, in light of deity > limit and wellspring (ressource) of finite-being as history: limit because God’s not there and wellspring because anticipation of thought of Being toujours voit venir Dieu
Levinas proposes an ethics w/out law and a language w/out phrase
Levinas renews empiricism, revealing it to itself as metaphysics, he even says, “the radical empiricism confident in the instruction of exteriority”

ATIA.content: Levinas: best way to see the other is to not notice the color of his eyes [Derrida points out Levinas is speaking about man]
Levinas has never inscribed trace of an-other as animal (far as I know)
despite all his ruptures, Levinas in no way interrupts the axis of human subject re: animal sacrifice, gives animal no capacity for the face-to-face
list of Levinas’ ruptures, obsessions, and also the fact that the face remains fraternal
Levinas reconfigures Descartes’ infinite will to “I am (following) after the infinite” > subject as host/hostage of the infinite
Levinas’ nudity doesn’t concern itself w/ sexual difference, w/ animal
if Levinas doesn’t know if the animal has a face, doesn’t this call into question the whole discourse/ethics of the face?
something in Levinas closed off to future he “barely” opens up, i.e. his “no” to animal’s face
for Levinas, “thou shalt not kill” is the 1st commandment to come from face of the other > refers only to the face, don’t murder the face, my neighbor, my brother, another human

responsibility of one who says “here I am” is Levinas’ first inspiration for his “first philosophy”; it is autodeictic, autobiographical: 1) exposing oneself before the law 2) ability to respond to an appeal or command of the other
death, for Levinas, the moment the other no longer responds (different from animal nonresponse)
[Derrida on limitations of Levinas’ thinking around dog Bobby]
Levinas’ Bobby dog is a witness for us, an other w/out alterity: recalls the subject to being subject > this is not sufficient deconstruction of Cartesian man/animal borderline
Levinas’ 3rd party, an other of the other, in contrast to Lacan’s “there is no Other of the Other” > but, for both of them, what about the animal-other?

FS.content: [Levinas’] face as structuralist repose [?], peacefulness of a spectacle, horizon

DIF.content: Levinas’ trace, enigma of absolute alterity (a past never present), solicits domination of beings (w/in these limits, differance implies Levinas’ entire critique of classical ontology)

DPi.content: for Levinas, “Thou shall not kill” [cf. AD p. 6] is the first commandment, first meaning of face, does not contradict DP
for Levinas, peace is the ethical itself

ATM.content: “he will have obligated (il aura obligé),” a phrase knotted up (se noue) in a certain way of tying (lier), a serial structure of a singular type > edges of the sentence in fog, belong to the night

to neither pay homage to, nor “rendez-vous” w/ Levinas, a gesture beyond any possible restitution, operating w/out debt: absolute ingratitude, Derrida would pay homage to Levinas’ radical generosity, which requires, “ingratitude de l’autre”
passage beyond language requires language, or requires text as a place for the trace of a step (pas) that passes beyond language, not (present) elsewhere [not classical]

Levinas negotiates his negotiation w/ the unnegotiable in a way where he negotiates the negotiation (he reties the thread, weaves his interruptions of the same), to give the other a chance [Derrida refers to a double negation here], reprend dans sa toile l’histoire de toutes ses ruptures
no tear (déchirure) possible in Levinas’ text w/out a certain notching (échancrure) of the 2nd moment, and certain contamination btwn the 2 > he likes the tear he detests contamination
“metaphors” of seam and tear (couture et déchirure) obsess Levinas’ texts
for Levinas, interruption puts an end to the authority of the Said, the thematical, dialectical, the same, the economical

Levinas describes how the enveloping continuum or tissue of the State, the dialectic, etc., preserves itself by cutting out interruptions and retying/maintaining itself in suppressing them: Levinas reties cut threads (not continuous ones): this is the trace of his diachrony, trace of discontinuity
since the State reties knots around interruptions too, Levinas must be retying cut threads instead of continuous ones, though Derrida stresses these knots look the same
[Derrida wonders about the risk of Levinas’ obligated negotiation, what he calls an inevitable “concession”: to stricture interruptions, contaminate, interrupt them]
via Levinas, interruptions unbound “together,” in the “same” sériature, in dia-synchrony, a serial one time of “several times” that took place only once

no edges in this interruptive series, in this incomparable stricture, but tapering points (establishing continuity at a distance [?]) > binding & unbinding, the lace (lacet) of obligation is in place (not a trap): an ob-ligation that un-binds, opens up religion in this very unbinding

the taking place in another place of Levinas’s oeuvre is an extravagant topic, another thinking of the name, a thinking that is tout autre because open to the name of the other> (u-topic only for those who believe they know ce qui a lieu et ce qui tient lieu)
Levinas has not only withdrawn dissymmetrical responsibility from circle (of pact, debt, synchronic reciprocity, recognition) but also from annular alliance, from the rounds (tour)
if Levinas insists on superimposing the trace, leaving a trace, entracing, how can we dissociate this trace from a sign?
Levinas plays a game that’s not a game, the gratuity of his work, what he still calls liturgy > “it is ethics itself”
Levinas’ intr(el)aced saying [dire entr(el)acé]
the retrait Levinas re-marks is not unique, though it remarks the unique, its seriasure is unique > not his signature but his seriasure

[re: Levinas] by making sexual difference secondary, by excluding the feminine, does She figure “the wholly other of this Saying of the wholly other,” thus under-signing the undersigned of the work [He?], that is, countersigning, not as a redoubling of the signature—but autrement que signer
sensitive to violence, Derrida reminds us that Levinas never erased the sexual mark of his signature, and referred to tout autre as feminine, this fault of Derrida’s, who does it wound?

AD.content: Levinas conscious of immense responsibility w/ modesty of prophet
how Levinas upsets (dérange) the dialectical affiliation of subject/predicate
that decision & responsibility are always of the other, the making unconscious of the Schmittian sovereign decision (cf. POOF 68-9), not how Levinas would put it

for Levinas, separation as “metaphysics,” an experience of hospitality, irruption of finite in infinite, the passage meta ta physika passes through hospitality of finite threshold that opens to infinity
aphoristic energy of déliasion in Levinas’ ethical affirmation: from subordination (no interiorization), to welcome of Most High (host), to unicity of possibility of substitution (hostage)
[sweet Derrida] miracle of trace allows us to read Levinas and have meaning for us today
very thrust (poussée) of Levinas’ thought: makes borderline (ligne de frontière), semantic identity of all the words he uses, tremble
given Levinas’ idea of paternal fecundity, he’s suspicious of psychoanalysis’ primal repression (for Levinas, it must be secondary)
Levinas’ ContraDiction, intimate caesura but also respiration of saying > non-dialectizable justice
Levinas trying to delimit a faith in election safe from (à l’abri de) all “nationalist” temptation
